mapper.select: select m.module_id, m.app_id, m.module_name, m.module_value, m.module_type, m.module_group, m.module_description from t_sys_user_role ur join t_sys_role r on ur.role_id = r.role_id join t_sys_role_module rm on r.role_id = rm.role_id join t_sys_module m on rm.module_id = m.module_id where ur.user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and m.app_id = #{appId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and m.module_type in (#{type,jdbcType=SMALLINT} ) order by m.module_id;
